title: Co-operative research in industry
brief_description: The film shows how small industrial firms in Britain band together to form Research Associations, thus enabling scientific research to be undertaken to help industry to produce more and better goods. The film illustrates the working of this system by examples of practical assistance of research results in the tanning, electrical, motor, laundry and printing industries.
